text: SusPICIOUS UNKNOWN CONTAINS * Calculate H(D): Entropy of dataset wrt oo WoR0S DENDER MAGes target feature. 489 true true false 541 true true false 693 false true true 782 false false false 976 false false false HD)=- Y (P(t)x logs(P(tr))) le{spam,ham} = —((P(t = spam) x loga(P(t = spam)) + (P(t = ham) X loga(P(t = ham))) /T\ = —((*/6 x log2(*/6)) + (*/5 x loga(*/s))) =1 DUBLIN
